@graph.name: Route Balancing and Driver Workload Distribution
@graph.description: Route4Me's Route Balancing add-on enables you to distribute routes as evenly as possible between your team members while maintaining full optimization for your business. An employee's performance suffers when they are overburdened, and a business owner's wallet suffers when an employee has too little work to do. With our one-click Route Balancing feature, you can instantly create optimized routes with equal stops, travel time, or distance. This solution also provides valuable insight into team efficiency, helping you determine if you've hired too many drivers or too few, allowing you to streamline your staff and optimize your business operations.
